description.value: An extension that mimics the default FHIR `MedicationDispense.category` element that can be used if multiple categories need to be captured.

purpose.value: This extension represents the category element of the FHIR R4 MedicationDispense resource. This extension is needed because `MedicationDispense.category` has a cardinality of 0..1 and the zib profile uses the category with a fixed code thereby denying the use of `category` for other purposes.

definition.value: Indicates the type of medication dispense (for example, where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered (i.e. inpatient or outpatient)).
